T02D1640:268a-0: @268a * // bdun tshigs kyi cho ga bzhugs /
T02D1640:268a-2: * // gang zhig tshe 'phos te bdun tshigs kyi dus su
T02D1640:268a-3: dge rtsa byed na ming byang ngam gos la sogs
T02D1640:268a-4: pa'i mtshan ma cig la rten bcas la //
T02D1640:268a-5: de nas mandala bya ba dang /
T02D1640:268a-6: mchod pa dang gtor ma gzhung bzhin du bshams te /
T02D1640:268a-7: de nas bdag lhag pa'i lhar bsgoms la /
T02D1640:268a-8: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la /
T02D1640:268a-9: mdun gyi nam mkha' la bsgoms la /
T02D1640:268a-10: mchod pa'i khyad par rnams kyis mchod /
T02D1640:268a-11: mkha' 'gro ma rnams la gtor ma bsngos la /
T02D1640:268a-12: de nas bstod pa dang 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D1640:268a-13: de nas bdag nyid kyi snying ga'i sa bon gyis 'od zer spros te /
T02D1640:268a-14: tshe 'das kyi sems yi ge aa thung ngu'i gzugs 'od zer gyi lcags kyus bkug la //
T02D1640:268a-15: rten gang yin pa de la bstim ste /
T02D1640:268a-16: rnam smin gyi lus de nyid du bsams te /
T02D1640:268a-17: bdag gi snying ga'i sa bon gyis 'od zer spros te /
T02D1640:268a-18: bsgrub bya'i snying gar thim pas /
T02D1640:268b-0: @268b las dang nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi sgrib pa sbyangs nas /
T02D1640:268b-1: lus shel dag pa dang 'dra bar bsam mo //
T02D1640:268b-2: de nas nam mkha' la bsgoms pa'i ye shes kyi
T02D1640:268b-3: dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rig pa'i lha mo rnams kyis
T02D1640:268b-4: phyag na bsnams pa'i bum pa'i bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun
T02D1640:268b-6: sgrib pa thams cad byang bar bsam //
T02D1640:268b-7: de nas bzlas pa bya ste /
T02D1640:268b-8: bdag gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi yi ge las /
T02D1640:268b-9: bzlas pa'i sngags kyi phreng ba las sbrul 'khyil pa'i tshul du bskor bar bsams la /
T02D1640:268b-10: de nas phreng sngags gang yin pa'i bzlas pa byas la /
T02D1640:268b-11: sngags kyi phreng ba las 'od zer 'phros pas /
T02D1640:268b-12: bsgrub bya'i snying gar thim nas lus ngag yid gsum
T02D1640:268b-13: gyi bag chags kyi sgrib pa'i dri ma thams cad
T02D1640:268b-14: sbyangs par bsam zhing bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D1640:268b-15: de nas smon lam gdab cing dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo //
T02D1640:268b-16: de nas bsgrub bya'i shes pa aa thung ngu de yang rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis bteg nas /
T02D1640:268b-17: nam mkha' la bzhugs pa'i gtso bo'i thugs kar thim par bsams te gnas btab pa'o //
T02D1640:268b-18: gal te rten med par gyur na /
T02D1640:268b-19: gang yin pa'i rnam smin gyi lus de nyid mngon sum dang 'dra bar bsams la /
T02D1640:268b-20: bsam rgyud gong ma bzhin du bya'o //
T02D1640:268b-21: de ltar bdun pa thams cad la bya'o //
